Player History
Had first career hit on 3/31/2013, off Chris Tillman (BAL)...
Injured on 4/4/2013 with a Broken Jaw, out for 3 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 7/24/2013, off Tommy Hanson (LAA)...
Injured on 4/18/2015 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for one week...
Traded from Kansas City to Los Angeles (N) on 5/10/2015 (Going to LAD: C Salvador Perez. Going to KC: P Shawn Tolleson)...
Injured on 8/23/2015 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 6 days...
1/30/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,865,000 through salary arbitration...
0/0/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,865,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,865,000 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Los Angeles (N) to Los Angeles (A) on 4/1/2019 (Going to LAD: P Alva Harting. Going to LAA: C Salvador Perez)...
Released by Los Angeles (A) on 4/21/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 5/1/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 2019...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/11/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $3,511,000 per year...
10/3/2022: Signed a contract extension with Chicago (A), $2,850,000 per year, for 2 years.
Traded from Chicago (A) to Cincinnati on 2/14/2023 (Going to CHW: P Roberto Osuna. Going to CIN: C Salvador Perez)...
Signed as a free agent by Washington on 2/22/2025 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (A) on 2/10/2028 to a 2-year deal worth $745,000 per year...
Released by Los Angeles (A) on 4/1/2028...
Signed as a free agent by Washington on 4/1/2028 to a minor league deal...
